properties.entry:
SELECT TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO, MEM_ID, NICKNAME, GRADE_NAME FROM
TB_NONMEM JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (TB_NONMEM.MEM_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MY_GRADE ON (TB_NONMEM.MEM_NO = GR_MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MEM_GRADE ON (TB_MY_GRADE.GRADE_NO = TB_MEM_GRADE.GRADE_NO) WHERE DELETE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY MEM_NO DESC

SELECT TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO, MEM_ID, NICKNAME, GRADE_NAME FROM
TB_NONMEM JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (TB_NONMEM.MEM_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MY_GRADE ON (TB_NONMEM.MEM_NO = GR_MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MEM_GRADE ON (TB_MY_GRADE.GRADE_NO = TB_MEM_GRADE.GRADE_NO) WHERE DELETE_YN = 'Y' AND MEM_ID = ?

SELECT MEM_NAME, EMAIL, MEM_PHONE, BORN_DATE, GRADE_NAME, TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE ,'YYYY.MM.DD') "JOIN_DATE" FROM TB_NONMEM JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (TB_NONMEM.MEM_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MY_GRADE ON (TB_NONMEM.MEM_NO = GR_MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MEM_GRADE ON (TB_MY_GRADE.GRADE_NO = TB_MEM_GRADE.GRADE_NO) WHERE DELETE_YN = 'Y' AND TB_NONMEM.MEM_NO = ?
